actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 100 percent deduction for expenses related to identity theft.

summary.text: Identify Theft Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction from gross income (available to taxpayers who do not itemize deductions) for all identity theft expenses arising from a fraud committed or attempted using identifying information without authority.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 100 percent deduction for expenses related to identity theft.
